alert.note: Alert for West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 1:48PM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM SUNDAY TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 7 and 14 inches, with higher amounts north of Rabbit Ears Pass. Winds gusting between 40 and 60 mph creating near blizzard conditions. * WHERE...Rabbit Ears Pass. * WHEN...Snow and winds will increase Sunday morning and snow will be heavy at times during the day. The snow will diminish Sunday night, but it will still be windy with extensive blowing and drifting snow. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible, especially during the day Sunday.
info.instruction: Consider avoiding travel over Rabbit Ears Pass on Sunday. If you do travel, drive with extreme caution. Consider taking a winter storm kit along with you, including such items as tire chains, booster cables, flashlight, shovel, blankets and extra clothing. Also take water, a first aid kit, and anything else that would help you survive in case you become stranded. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.
